about_the_game:
Slash, dash, and shoot your way to victory in this comedy boss rush action adventure! Join tired mailwoman Gail and wired fairy Irisia on a quest filled with mishaps, mayhem, and mail-related puns! Can they deliver as they make their way through a land filled with monsters and peculiar characters, or will they be returned to sender?

Boss Rush Delivery is a top-down, 2D pixel art, boss rush action adventure. It features a comprehensive combat system with dashing, melee and range attacks. Battle 8 unique and quirky bosses in intense bullet hell battles that will challenge your skill and reflexes.

The game's narrative features a cast of peculiar and memorable characters, humorous dialogue with tons of puns and wordplay, and a heartfelt story.

It also features expansive gameplay customization settings for added accessibility and replayability, allowing newer players to take on the battles at their own pace, and giving more experienced players a variety of options to challenge their skills.

If you enjoy boss battles and quirky humour, we think you will love Boss Rush Delivery!

name: Boss Rush Delivery
short_description: Battling beasts and bureaucracy, a newbie mailwoman must deliver a letter of utmost importance to a noble in a neighbouring nation. Shoot, slash, and dash to victory over 8 epic bosses in this fast-paced comedy boss rush action adventure! Delivery or Death!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal
